features: ARE THE DISHES CLEAN OR DIRTY? 🟢 No more guessing whether the dishes in your dishwasher are clean or dirty because with your MIMILU Clean Dirty Magnet For Dishwashers, you always know whether the dishes inside your dishwasher are dirty or clean.

WORKS WITH ANY DISHWASHER 🟢 Your Non-Scratching MIMILU Dishwasher Magnet is made with a strong magnet to adhere to any metal dishwasher. It also comes with 2 double-sided adhesive stickers for non-metallic dishwashers.

BUILT TO WITHSTAND DAILY USE 🟢 Your MIMILU Clean Dirty Sign For Dishwashers is durable and made to last. The sign and ‘clean dirty’ text is water-proof and durable. The slider is designed to be smooth, sturdy, and long lasting. Size 7x 2 x 0.3

EASY TO USE + LARGE TEXT 🟢 Attach the dishwasher magnet to your dishwasher and slide the cover between dirty and clean. For non-magnetic dishwashers, use the included double-sided stickers to attach the dishwasher magnet. The large text makes it easy to read and tell if the dishes are dirty or clean.

100% MONEY BACK SATISFACTION GUARANTEE 🟢 We stand behind our products 100%. If for any reason you are not happy with this product, simply contact us within 60 days of purchase for a replacement or return it for a full refund.

GREAT INEXPENSIVE GIFT 🟢 The MIMILU Dishwasher Clean Dirty Sign makes a great and practical Housewarming Gift for New Homes, White Elephant Gift, Secret Santa Gift, Inexpensive Stocking Stuffer Gift under $10, Dishwasher Accessories Gift, etc.
body.description: Introducing the MIMILU Clean Dirty Dishwasher Magnets - one of the Must-Have dishwasher accessories that brings efficiency to your kitchen. Tired of the classic dishwasher guessing game – "ARE THE DISHES CLEAN OR DIRTY?" Say goodbye to that frustration with your dishwasher clean dirty sign by MIMILU! It is 7”x2”x 0.2” with large text to make it easy for your family and guests to know at a glance whether your dishwasher is full of clean or dirty dishes Even little kids know with the MIMILU dishwasher magnets. Featuring a smooth slide feature that is designed for your convenience, the MIMILU clean dirty magnet for dishwashers effortlessly changes from "Clean" to "Dirty" with a simple slide, after loading or unloading your dishwasher. Gone are the days of second-guessing the status of your dishes. Now, you can instantly see the status of your dishes with your MIMILU clean dirty magnet. Crafted from premium materials, the MIMILU clean dirty dishwasher magnet is built to withstand the rigors of everyday kitchen life. It's easy to clean and maintains its vibrant appearance for years to come. The strong magnetic backing ensures a secure attachment to your dishwasher, staying in place even during the busiest kitchen moments. The MIMILU clean and dirty dishwasher magnet is ready to use straight out of the box. Looking for a thoughtful and practical gift? Look no further! The MIMILU Clean Dirty Dishwasher Magnet makes for an excellent housewarming gift, or a just-because surprise gesture for friends and family. It's a small yet impactful addition to any kitchen – one that's sure to be appreciated and used daily. At MIMILU, we're dedicated to providing top-notch products that simplify your life and add a touch of delight to your daily routines. Our Clean Dirty Dishwasher Magnet Sign is backed by our commitment to quality, functionality, and customer satisfaction with our 100% Satisfaction Guarantee!

reviews.reviewText: We both 2 😆 my kids love it too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy and clean
reviews.reviewText: I looked at many but didn’t want red or green, or anything that grabs attention. I mean, I just need the clean or dirty information without fanfare. This looked like it would fit the bill and it’s as nice in person as it appeared online. It’s easy to slide the cover piece between clean/dirty and the magnet is strong. All in all, I’m pleased and my adult 20-something kids complimented the design too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It took a while to get this to stick to the dishwasher, but now it does. It's very handy since my husband constantly asks "Are these clean or dirty". Now he knows. Very handy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice size, easy to slide the window back and forth
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice clean design that works well to communicate the status of the dishes. The entire back of the sign is a magnet, so it stays in place well. The slider moves easily. I don't think it will scratch my dishwasher or rust

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like it, but the magnet is very weak
reviews.reviewText: I was really looking forward to using this clean/dirty dishwasher sign. We currently use a small square of paper attached to a magnetic clip that we flip over to indicate the state of the dishwasher. It's effective but not attractive.This sign is well constructed, with a slider that allows you to switch between the clean/dirty states. It's a little bigger than I think it needs to be, but that's a personal preference. What I don't like is the cheap magnetic backing. It does not adequately fix to our surface (we use the side of our refrigerator, which is ferromagnetic, whereas our dishwasher's brushed stainless is not). The sign is already fairly weighty, already so a strong magnet is necessary to support its weight. I tested the magnet on other surfaces - including a whiteboard designed for magnetic clips - and the sign would barely adhere.I like the sign. I do not like the magnet. I will probably glue a stronger magnet to the back and maybe still be able to put it to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Tired of constantly having to check with the whole family about the status of the dishes in the dishwasher? Or trying to Sherlock Holmes your way to the answer by inspecting the dishes in the washer for food remnants or pooled water? I can't count the number of times over the years I've had to say, "Is the dishwasher dirty or clean?" - shouted as people race out the door, texted on the fly, yelled across the house, first thing in the morning, etc. Ugh.I like this product because it uses both writing and color coding (red-green, intuitive) to indicate the dish status, sits unobtrusively on the outside of the dishwasher while still being big enough to easily read, and has a no-effort slide mechanism to change between "Dirty" and "Clean" options - which means that you can note if it's half-full of dirty dishes it's still dirty, and if it's clean but you pop a fork out and leave the rest for someone else to unload, there's never any question as to the status of the rest of the dishes as long as you switch it from "dirty to clean" as soon as you set it to run, and conversely switch from "clean" to "dirty" as soon as you unload it. Incredibly easy to do as you shut the door.Overall an easy way to communicate the status of the dishes without having to chase down the last person who used the dishwasher.The packaging is nice, and the adhesive options are a magnet and extra included stickers if your dishwasher does not have a metal exterior. The only question I have is whether the magnet might over time disrupt the computer in the dishwasher, but that's mostly because I have no idea how strong a magnet has to be (or how long it has to be in close proximity to computer components) to cause an issue.
